Translations.Text: I Nuê, zik, mi inâaô. Njaweb as ed. Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, si lefqaâ abarar
Neneêêel it mgal agdud i iskaddben issekniyen nne£. Llan, s tidep, d agdud n dir. Ne$ves iten meôôa
I Dawed akked Sliman, mi êudden $ef yiger, ideg ksant wulli n medden. Nella d Inagan uêuddu nnsen
Nessfehm as p i Sliman. I sin, Nefka ûûwab, tamusni. Nêeppem i idurar akked igvav ad sbuccâen Dawed. D ayen Newqem
Nessêefv as, ad awen iûnaâ iceîîiven, ara iêarben fellawen si tiytiwin. Day a ppesnemmrem
I Sliman, avu n tarikt, ipûuvu s lameô is, $er tmurt i Neôqa. Nezga Néeô yal cci
Ger ccwaîen, wa i$evves as, wa iqubel cce$l nniven. Nella d imêaraben nnsen
I Yub, mi inuj $eô Mass is: "nek pwa$e$. Keçç, Tifev akw wid ipêunun
Njaweb as ed. Nekkes as it ivuôôen; Nerra yas d tawacult is, akw, yides, tin i p icban. D aêunu s$uône£, d asmekti i iâabaden
Ismaâil, Idris, Dulkifl, akken ma llan, d iûebôiyen
Nesskecm iten deg uêunu nne£. Nitni, s tidep, seg wid imaânen
I Dannun, mi iôuê s wurrif. I$il ur Nesâi ara adabu fellas. Inâaô, di tellis: "ur illi ôebbi siwa Keçç. Gedha s yiseK! Nek lli$ si imednas
Njaweb as ed. Nâateq it si éémik. Akka ay Nâateq lmumnin
I Zakaria, mi inuj $uô Mass is: "a Mass iw! Ur iyi Ippaooa ara d amengur. Keçç, Tifev akw iweôôaten
Njaweb as ed. Nefka yas Yaêia, Nesseêla yas tameîîut is. Nitni, s tidep, izga izwar lxiô nnsen. Pnujun $uône£, s tugwdi d usirem. Unzen a£
Ar tin i iqqimen zeddiget, Nûuv si ôôuê nne£. Nerra p, neppat akked mmi s, d assekni i imavalen
Lois agi nnwen, war ccek, d lois yiwen. Nek d Mass nnwen, ihi âabdet iyI
Gezmen lameô nnsen garasen. £uône£, akw, ara d u$alen
